brief_summary.textblock:
It is a double blinded randomized control trial   assessing the use of Oral paracetamol in
      managing the intrapartum pain.

clinical_study.brief_title: Oral Paracetamol as Preemptive Analgesia for Labor Pain

detailed_description.textblock:
It is a double blinded randomized control trial  comparing the use of Oral paracetamol to
      placebo in managing the intrapartum pain.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  primigravida

          -  The gestational age between   37- 42 weeks

          -  Not seeking analgesia

          -  Singleton pregnancy

          -  vertex

          -  Spontaneous onset of labour

          -  1st stage of labour (less than 5 cm)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Extreme of age (below18-above 40)

          -  Multiparous

          -  Multiple gestation

          -  Malpresentation

          -  Congenital or acquired pelvic abnormalities(eg. Poliomyelitis)

          -  Any medical disorder with pregnancy

          -  Induction of labour

          -  Advanced 1st stage > 5 cm

          -  Use of any other kind of analgesia before recruitment in the study

          -  Scared uterus

          -  Fetal distress

clinical_study.official_title: Oral Paracetamol as Preemptive Analgesia for Labor Pain

authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: To document the efficacy of oral paracetamol, in pregnant women in labor, as demonstrated by the degree of pain relief and need for additional analgesia during the labor process and the early postpartum period.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: To document safety and evaluate adverse events recorded during the study either maternal or fetal.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of medication till 24 hours postpartum

secondary_outcome.description: To assess the effect of the duration of labor.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of medication till delivery of fetus.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Treatment
